script.content:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

# Load the hospital data
file_path = 'hospital_data.csv'  # Replace with your file path
data = pd.read_csv(file_path)

# Preview the dataset
print("First few rows of the dataset:")
print(data.head())

# Basic data info
print("\nData Info:")
print(data.info())

# Summary statistics
print("\nSummary Statistics:")
print(data.describe())

# Example analyses:

# 1. Patient demographics: Age distribution
if 'Age' in data.columns:
    plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
    sns.histplot(data['Age'], bins=20, kde=True)
    plt.title('Age Distribution of Patients')
    plt.xlabel('Age')
    plt.ylabel('Number of Patients')
    plt.show()

# 2. Gender distribution
if 'Gender' in data.columns:
    gender_counts = data['Gender'].value_counts()
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 4))
    sns.barplot(x=gender_counts.index, y=gender_counts.values)
    plt.title('Gender Distribution')
    plt.xlabel('Gender')
    plt.ylabel('Number of Patients')
    plt.show()

# 3. Common diagnoses
if 'Diagnosis' in data.columns:
    top_diagnoses = data['Diagnosis'].value_counts().head(10)
    plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
    sns.barplot(x=top_diagnoses.values, y=top_diagnoses.index)
    plt.title('Top 10 Diagnoses')
    plt.xlabel('Number of Cases')
    plt.ylabel('Diagnosis')
    plt.show()

# 4. Length of stay analysis
if 'Length_of_Stay' in data.columns:
    plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
    sns.histplot(data['Length_of_Stay'], bins=30)
    plt.title('Distribution of Length of Stay')
    plt.xlabel('Days')
    plt.ylabel('Number of Patients')
    plt.show()

# 5. Readmission rates (assuming a 'Readmitted' column with yes/no)
if 'Readmitted' in data.columns:
    readmission_counts = data['Readmitted'].value_counts()
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 4))
    sns.barplot(x=readmission_counts.index, y=readmission_counts.values)
    plt.title('Readmission Rates')
    plt.xlabel('Readmitted')
    plt.ylabel('Number of Patients')
    plt.show()

# Add more analyses as needed based on available data columns
